price: And among the devils [We subjected] those who dived for him[34] and performed other duties. It is We Who were watching over them[35].
arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعۡمَلُونَ عَمَلٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
footnotes:
[34] Bringing him pearls.
 [35] Preventing any disobedience from Solomon's instructions and protecting him from being harmed by them.
